articles.title: Riverside County ICUs now at 100% of capacity - Press-Enterprise
articles.description: San Bernardino County’s adjusted rate — which does not include intensive care beds for infants and children, and reflecting penalties used by the state — is also at 0%
articles.content:
Riverside County is using 100% of its hospital intensive care unit capacity as of Monday, Dec. 14, a spokesman said, but that doesn’t mean the countywide system is completely out of beds.

articles.title: WHO says authorities investigating new COVID-19 variant in England - Reuters
articles.description: The World Health Organization is aware of a new variant of COVID-19 that has emerged in Britain, but there is no evidence the strain behaves differently to existing types of the virus, it said on Monday.
